assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Cystic_Fibrosis_Mutation_Renewal_Additional_Information_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Does the patient have any other source of funding to cover this drug therapy (e.g. 3rd party insurance); (Y/N/DK for 'Don't Know') If known, Describe:* I have discussed with the patient the purpose of releasing information to B.C Ministry of Health to obtain exceptional coverage for the requested medication. Personal information on this form is collected, used and disclosed under the authority of, and in accordance with, the British Columbia Pharmaceutical Services Act and Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act. It will not be disclosed to any persons without the patientâ€™s consent. The information you provide will be relevant to and used solely to (a) provide exceptional coverage for the medication requested, (b) to implement, monitor and evaluate this and other Ministry programs, and (c) to manage and plan for the health system generally.
